mapper.select: select count(1) from T_SPECIAL_EQUIP_EXT where EQUIP_CODE=#{equipCode} and SPECIAL_EQUIP_CODE=#{specialEquipCode} and rownum=1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_SPECIAL_EQUIP_EXT ( REC_ID, REG_ORG, REG_NO, EQUIP_CODE, SPECIAL_EQUIP_TYPE, SPECIAL_EQUIP_CODE, FACT_NO, EQUIP_INNER_NO, EQUIP_POSITION, EQUIP_DETAILED_POSITION, EQUIP_PARAMETER, MANAGE_ORG, SEC_ORG, SEC_STAFF_NAME, SEC_STAFF_PHONE, SEC_STAFF_MOBILE, LINKMAN_NAME, LINKMAN_PHONE, LINKMAN_MOBILE, REMARK, REC_CREATOR, REC_CREATE_TIME, EXT1, EXT2, EXT3, EXT4, EXT5 ) VALUES ( #{recId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{equipCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{specialEquipType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{specialEquipCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{factNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{equipInnerNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{equipPosition,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{equipDetailedPosition,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{equipParameter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{manageOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{secOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{secStaffName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{secStaffPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{secStaffMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{linkmanName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{linkmanPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{linkmanMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recCreator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recCreateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ext1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ext2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ext3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ext4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ext5,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update:
UPDATE T_SPECIAL_EQUIP_EXT SET
REG_ORG=#{regOrg},
REG_NO=#{regNo},
EQUIP_CODE=#{equipCode},
SPECIAL_EQUIP_TYPE=#{specialEquipType},
SPECIAL_EQUIP_CODE=#{specialEquipCode},
FACT_NO=#{factNo},
EQUIP_INNER_NO=#{equipInnerNo},
EQUIP_POSITION=#{equipPosition},
EQUIP_DETAILED_POSITION=#{equipDetailedPosition},
EQUIP_PARAMETER=#{equipParameter},
MANAGE_ORG=#{manageOrg},
SEC_ORG=#{secOrg},
SEC_STAFF_NAME=#{secStaffName},
SEC_STAFF_PHONE=#{secStaffPhone},
SEC_STAFF_MOBILE=#{secStaffMobile},
LINKMAN_NAME=#{linkmanName},
LINKMAN_PHONE=#{linkmanPhone},
LINKMAN_MOBILE=#{linkmanMobile},
REMARK=#{remark},
ARCHIVE_FLAG=#{archiveFlag},
REC_STATUS=#{recStatus},
EXT1=#{ext1},
EXT2=#{ext2},
EXT3=#{ext3},
EXT4=#{ext4},
EXT5=#{ext5},
REC_REVISOR=#{recRevisor}, REC_REVISE_TIME=#{recReviseTime} WHERE EQUIP_CODE=#{equipCode}
mapper.select:
SELECT a.REC_ID as "recId", a.TEST_REC_ID as "testRecId", a.TESTLIST_DETAIL_REC_ID as "testlistDetailRecId", a.EQUIP_CODE as "equipCode", a.EQUIP_NAME as "equipName", a.MAT_SPECIFI as "matSpecifi", a.MANUFACTURE_NO as "manufactureNo", a.MANUFACTURE as "manufacture", a.INSTALLATION_UNIT as "installationUnit", a.VERIFY_DATE as "verifyDate", a.VERIFICATION_NO as "verificationNo", a.VERIFICATION_TYPE as "verificationType", a.VERIFY_PROOF as "verifyProof", a.VERIFY_REPORT_NO as "verifyReportNo", a.VERIFY_REPORT_TYPE as "verifyReportType", a.VERIFY_REPORT_NAME as "verifyReportName", a.VERIFY_REPORT_DATE as "verifyReportDate", a.VERIFY_FEE as "verifyFee", a.VERIFY_RESULT as "verifyResult", a.VERIFY_CONCLUSION as "verifyConclusion", a.VERIFY_REPORT_ATT as "verifyReportAtt", a.LAST_VERIFY_DATE as "lastVerifyDate", a.NEXT_VERIFY_DATE as "nextVerifyDate", a.POSITION1_CODE as "position1Code", a.POSITION1_NAME as "position1Name", a.POSITION2_CODE as "position2Code", a.POSITION2_NAME as "position2Name", a.POSITION3 as "position3", a.POSITION_REMARK as "positionRemark", a.FAULT_NO as "faultNo", a.VERIFY_NOTE as "verifyNote", a.COMPANY_CODE as "companyCode", a.COMPANY_NAME as "companyName", a.REC_CREATOR as "recCreator", a.REC_CREATE_TIME as "recCreateTime", a.REC_REVISOR as "recRevisor", a.REC_REVISE_TIME as "recReviseTime", a.REC_DELETOR as "recDeletor", a.REC_DELETE_TIME as "recDeleteTime", a.DELETE_FLAG as "deleteFlag", a.ARCHIVE_FLAG as "archiveFlag", b.REC_STATUS as "recStatus", a.EXT1 as "ext1", a.EXT2 as "ext2", a.EXT3 as "ext3", a.EXT4 as "ext4", a.EXT5 as "ext5", b.SEND_VERIFY_NO as "sendVerifyNo", b.CHECK_NO as "checkNo", b.VERIFY_DEPT as "verifyDept", a.VERIFY_VALIDITY_DATE as "verifyValidityDate", b.EDIT_DEPT_CODE as "editDeptCode",
a.DOC_ID as "docId"
FROM T_DETECTION_DETAIL a LEFT JOIN T_DETECTION b ON a.TEST_REC_ID=b.REC_ID LEFT JOIN T_EQUIPMENT c ON c.EQUIP_CODE=a.EQUIP_CODE WHERE 1=1 and a.EQUIP_CODE=#{equipCode} order by a.VERIFY_VALIDITY_DATE desc

SELECT a.REC_ID as "recId", a.TEST_REC_ID as "testRecId", a.TESTLIST_DETAIL_REC_ID as "testlistDetailRecId", a.EQUIP_CODE as "equipCode", a.EQUIP_NAME as "equipName", a.MAT_SPECIFI as "matSpecifi", a.MANUFACTURE_NO as "manufactureNo", a.MANUFACTURE as "manufacture", a.INSTALLATION_UNIT as "installationUnit", a.VERIFY_DATE as "verifyDate", a.VERIFICATION_NO as "verificationNo", a.VERIFICATION_TYPE as "verificationType", a.VERIFY_PROOF as "verifyProof", a.VERIFY_REPORT_NO as "verifyReportNo", a.VERIFY_REPORT_TYPE as "verifyReportType", a.VERIFY_REPORT_NAME as "verifyReportName", a.VERIFY_REPORT_DATE as "verifyReportDate", a.VERIFY_FEE as "verifyFee", a.VERIFY_RESULT as "verifyResult", a.VERIFY_CONCLUSION as "verifyConclusion", a.VERIFY_REPORT_ATT as "verifyReportAtt", a.LAST_VERIFY_DATE as "lastVerifyDate", a.NEXT_VERIFY_DATE as "nextVerifyDate", a.POSITION1_CODE as "position1Code", a.POSITION1_NAME as "position1Name", a.POSITION2_CODE as "position2Code", a.POSITION2_NAME as "position2Name", a.POSITION3 as "position3", a.POSITION_REMARK as "positionRemark", a.FAULT_NO as "faultNo", a.VERIFY_NOTE as "verifyNote", a.COMPANY_CODE as "companyCode", a.COMPANY_NAME as "companyName", a.REC_CREATOR as "recCreator", a.REC_CREATE_TIME as "recCreateTime", a.REC_REVISOR as "recRevisor", a.REC_REVISE_TIME as "recReviseTime", a.REC_DELETOR as "recDeletor", a.REC_DELETE_TIME as "recDeleteTime", a.DELETE_FLAG as "deleteFlag", a.ARCHIVE_FLAG as "archiveFlag", b.REC_STATUS as "recStatus", a.EXT1 as "ext1", a.EXT2 as "ext2", a.EXT3 as "ext3", a.EXT4 as "ext4", a.EXT5 as "ext5", b.SEND_VERIFY_NO as "sendVerifyNo", b.CHECK_NO as "checkNo", b.VERIFY_DEPT as "verifyDept", a.VERIFY_VALIDITY_DATE as "verifyValidityDate", b.EDIT_DEPT_CODE as "editDeptCode",
a.DOC_ID as "docId"
FROM T_DETECTION_DETAIL a LEFT JOIN T_DETECTION b ON a.TEST_REC_ID=b.REC_ID LEFT JOIN T_EQUIPMENT c ON c.EQUIP_CODE=a.EQUIP_CODE WHERE 1=1 and a.EQUIP_CODE=#{equipCode} order by a.VERIFY_VALIDITY_DATE desc
